```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```
 
## Problem 1

```{r message = FALSE}
pols_df =
  read_csv("data/pols-month.csv") |> 
  relocate(mon, prez_gop, prez_dem) |> 
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = prez_gop:prez_dem,
    names_to = "president",
    values_to = "yes_no"
  )|> 
  filter(yes_no != 0) |> 
    mutate(president = case_match(
    president,
    "prez_dem" ~ "dem",
    "prez_gop" ~ "gop"
  )) |> 
    select(-day, -yes_no)
```
